function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased dependence on telehealth clinics using online video conference software","Impact":"Limited internet access and technologic capabilities for patients, potential information security risks","Mitigation":"Provide alternative communication methods for patients with limited internet access, implement strict information security measures","Technologies":"Secure video conferencing software, data encryption tools","People":"Patients, clinic staff, trainees","Owner":"Clinic staff, IT department"},{"Description":"Trainees making initial contact with patients for telehealth consultations","Impact":"Risk of establishing rapport with patients without in-person encounters","Mitigation":"Provide training on effective communication and rapport-building for trainees","Technologies":"Communication training programs","People":"Trainees, patients","Owner":"Clinic staff, training department"},{"Description":"Lack of physical examination in telehealth consultations","Impact":"Potential for missing important diagnostic information","Mitigation":"Train staff on conducting thorough remote assessments and use technology for remote monitoring and diagnostics","Technologies":"Remote monitoring devices, diagnostic tools","People":"Clinic staff, patients","Owner":"Clinic staff, medical department"}]}
